Office of the Registrar
Division of Academic Affairs















You are hereRegistrar Home ›  
Contact Us






Have a question?  Need to get in touch with the Office of the Registrar?  Use the form below or the staff directory for direct phone and email addresses.
If you have questions with regards to payments or tuition, please visit Seawolf Services.
If you have questions about your Admissions status or transcripts that you have submitted for admissions purposes, please refer to the Admissions Department's staff directory to find your evaluator's contact information.
This form will be sent to the Office of the Registrar. If you include your email address, a copy will be sent to you.
Problems on our website? Contact registrar@sonoma.edu.






First Name *



Last Name *



SSU ID Number 

This is NOT your Social Security Number.  Do not send us your SSN.


Email Address *



Phone Number *



My Status *

 I am currently attending SSU. 


  I am a former student of SSU. 


 I am a graduate of SSU. 


 I am a new applicant or admit. 




If you are a new applicant or admit, please go to the Admissions website.


My question is about: *

 Registration  (adding, dropping, leave of absence, withdrawal, etc.) 


 Transcripts 


 Graduation 


 Grades 


 Articulation 


 Transfer credit 


 Other:  Please explain below. 




Question or Comment *
Please describe.








CAPTCHAThis question is for testing whether or not you are a human visitor and to prevent automated spam submissions.
